changelog:
* QR Code for Extended Public Keys (XPUBs). 
* The new bootloader version 2.1.4 is now included for enhanced system performance and security. 
* The screen will now automatically turn off when the device is locked, helping to extend the life of the OLED display and save energy.
changelog_bitcoinonly:
* QR Code for Extended Public Keys (XPUBs). 
* The new bootloader version 2.1.4 is now included for enhanced system performance and security. 
* The screen will now automatically turn off when the device is locked, helping to extend the life of the OLED display and save energy.
